content.detailedDescription: I was driving north bound on simms street in southwest littleton/ken caryl between 9:30pm-10pm. i saw a fireball object in the sky below the rain clouds. the flight was north to south in a hovering/bobbled sort of flight pattern. glowing yello/orange i took a picture. the picture turned out without the fireball lighting and instead a dull grey of the surface of the ufo. a few seconds later it had vanished!?!? i had felt shocked and excited at first because it was unlike any aviation plane or commercial passenger plane! i then felt very frustrated because i was in able to get video because i was driving at the time.
content.summary: I was driving north bound between 9:30pm-10pm. i saw a fireball object in the sky below the rain clouds. the flight was north to south in a hovering/bobbled sort of flight path. glowing yello/orange i took a picture. the picture turned out dull grey. gone

content.detailedDescription: I had been riding my motorcycle and came home late at night, and i knew being a star gazer to always look up late at night to hopefully see a shooting star. i got way more to see than i hoped for. i looked straight up facing the south and instantly caught six pinpoints of light traveling west to east almost straight up; a little south far outside our atmosphere. 1-white pinpoint light leading, 2-perfectly spaced very far behind & spread far apart from each other (given how very many miles up they were); then 3-very far behind and perfectly spaced very far apart to each other. i knew with my excellent vision & familiarity of what satellites look like passing by with moonlight reflecting on them; these were craft under intelligent control, traveling together in perfect synchronicity; way, way, way outside our atmosphere. i ran in the front door finding my mother & father in the unlit living room watching tv. i urged them "hurry up, hurry up, i want you to see this". going back outside to the driveway with them in tow & looking up; the lights were now visible for about 30 seconds heading straight east. i knew what i saw before getting my parents outside to see them. there is no question in my mind of what i saw. silent, they were just passing by & i luckily saw them. i cannot give an exact date unfortunately in regard to matching others possibly seeing them. i had this motorcycle and rode it in michigan from april 21, 1979 until i moved to dallas tx in about april in 1982. that is the span of time when this occurred. in a warm weather month in the state of michigan 20-miles north of detroit. either '79, '80, or '81.
content.summary: 6 pinpoints of light outside atmosphere in a shuffleboard pattern spaced very far apartl; 1, then 2, then 3 way outside our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, i also saw a ufo. well it was a friend and i who saw it,in stockton,ca in mid june of 1990 we were fishing.It was a red glowing sphere that was sort of rotating,there was no noise at all.If any one else remembers this day,please comment, i know someone else had also seen it.It was around 2:00 am and 3:30 am approx. but it only lasted around 20 minutes before flying away,to be honest i didnt see it fly, it was too fast.,almost like if you turn off the light very fast.,im not sure how far it was, but i know it was no plane or nothing i have ever seen before,it  what ever it was it knew we seen it, it was rotating sort of like playing a game ,then at times it would stop rotating but it had a constant red glow.I didnt have any camera at that time.I told my friend that was next to me "are you seen what im seeing", he replyed of course its a witch, that's what some people in mexico call ufo's, according to him. the naval base was located north west of were i was fishing and behind me i beleive was a water treatment plant or some type of plant,to the right is the bridge.I have told several people, but i know some dont beleive me. thats ok, i know what i saw.I have seen more ufo's in stockton, ca. but i just want to get this off my chest.

thank you for reading my experience.
content.summary: While fishing a friend and i saw a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 0200,0220am on april 7th i observed an object i cannot explain, i was startled, while finishing watching mountain men on demand.When i went outside, to stretch my legs, when i observed  a light coming over the old foundery that  came to a stop over the tree line just down the street from my home, this object made no sound,the thing that disturbed me was there was absolutely no ambient noise, no crickets, dogs etc.
i felt like my skin was crawling, and the smell of ozone and a metallic taste in my mouth.Just talking about it creeps me out. i don't know what i experienced, but i don't want to ever again,this object just hung there in the sky,and after a time just gently went back the way it came,no noise,... couldn't sleep afterwards, still have trouble believing what i observed....
content.summary: Obseverd an object i can't explain, and after i observed this object a military  helicopter  appeared.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on my front porch trying to listen for thunder from a distant storm and observed a slow moving, round light flying slowly from east to west for 2 - 3 minutes. initially i thought it was a satellite, but realized it too low. there was no apparent beacon light, no engine sounds. once it reached due south, it made a sudden sharp right 90 degree turn and the light was suddenly gone. i could no longer see the object.
content.summary: Slow moving orb-like light, no flashing lights,  low altitude. moved east to west, turned abruptly, went dark

content.detailedDescription: On may 6th between the hours of 12:00-1:00 a.M. i was laying in bed watching t.V. i noticed out of my bedroom window a ball of light that was gradualy changing colors. the colors were orange,red, and white. the object seemed to stay white for the most part. the object was close enough for me to hear if it made any sounds but it was dead silent. the object stayed at a consistent altitude and moving at a steady rate of speed. the weather was calm, almost no wind and just about no cloud cover. i started to think that maybe it was a chinese lantern. ive never been around one but im pretty sure they dont change color and are as big as the object i saw. i kinda lost view of the object because of a tree by my home. to be honest i really didnt think it was a ufo from outerspace, and like i said the first thing that crossed my mind was the chinese lantern. but shortly after i lost track of the object 2 jet fighters went flying by coming from the north west in the same direction the object was heading. these jets were pretty low traveling at a good rate of speed. it was dark out so i couldnt tell what type of jets they were. all i saw was a red light on each of the jets and one was behind the other and off to the side. i can tell you that there is a airforce base in niagara falls that isnt to far away, maybe a hour or so. and i dont know for sure how much activity goes on at the base. as long as i lived here in western ny i can honestly say ive never seen jets flying around till the morning of may 6th. so after seeing the jets it made me think that the obect wasnt a lantern or weather balloon. i have the sighting on video taken on my i phone, you cant see the jet fighters but you can hear them loud and clear on the video.
content.summary: I was watching tv saw the ufo out of my bedroom window moving west to east i then video taped it and two jet fighters went after it

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were coming home from a ride when i spoted something in the sky stationary, just hovering. i knew it was not a plane or helicopter because it was two mall and quiet. it began to move at different speed from very slow to just appearing in another space. it moved from west to north. i was afraid at first but i had to stay there and record it until it disappeared.
content.summary: The object was just hovering near downtown buffal. then stated moving toward the north stoping at times to hover  changing color.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my two brothers in their backyard around 8:15 in the evening when one of my brothers noticed this thing flying around in the sky. at first we all believed it to be a radio controlled flying toy of some sort. i then decided to video tape it and wished now that i taped the entire duration of this flying object. this thing would abruptly change directions and would also continuously flash green and red lights. it was also very fast. at that time i honestly did not and never have believed in ufo's. since i was not a believer, i stopped taping, but kept watching. the entire ordeal lasted approximately 15 minutes then was gone as fast as it appeared. i decided to send my video only when i read a local article about a ufo sighting in the area and thought possibly what we saw was also a ufo.
content.summary: While sitting in my brothers' yard we noticed a flying object appeared in the sky. it changed directions quickly and flashed green and red lights.

content.detailedDescription: Do not know if it was the same craft. but it made 3 passes eash time moving a little farther west before moving north from the south. each time it turned east and up and out of site. thought it might of been a helicopter at first but no sound thought maybe a plane . but no sound. thought maybe a drone but no sound and it went way to high and out of site. i do not know if it was just 2 or 6 different ones the picture and vidios were taken on a samsung  galaxy prevail phone. hope you can get something out of it. after this happened i stayed outside to see if i woud see more. the only thing i did see was way up there at almost 90 degrees where planes don't  fly. i understand that this was during the time we were getting ready to watch fireworks and during that time but they were not fire works that i know.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came from the south in pairs then as it came close to us it turned east and went straight up until out of site.

content.detailedDescription: red white aircraft extremly large going very fast to the left right and up n down multie times seen near daytona from  deltona and eventually went down out sight once recorded! no noise but very fast for large distance and stayed in same spot before directions each time
content.summary: Rd white airplane like totally 4 airplanes smahed together size moving extremly fast left roght ip down and stationary multiple times

content.detailedDescription: This barrel like ufo was super bright through binoculars but it was still light outside. the light coming from the craft was very bright. my husband spotted it from our backyard in the eastern sky, escondido, ca.
content.summary: Barrel like very bright light almost blinding through binoculars

content.detailedDescription: My family lived in granada hills, california.  event occurred sometime 1962/63.  my mother was driving us home, we were passing by holy cross hospital and alamany high school when i noticed a big bright flash across the horizon, and behind the hillside.  i remember it seemed large to me.  it was quick, my brother, sisters, or mother didn't say anything.  i felt strange that i was the only one that noticed it.  i looked around and didn't see a trailer or more so i left it at that. **about 4 to 6 months later, summertime,about mid day my older sister and i are in hawaii visiting family and my mom, aunt, younger sister and brother saw a ufo.  my mother and aunt are no longer with us, but my brother and sister are still around.  this is what they all told us when we came home from hawaii.  we are still living in the same house which is only a few miles from my event, my mother was in the shower and my aunt, brother, and sister hear a strange sound.  it sounded like it is coming from above the house.  they go out the front door and see a round object in the sky above the house just hovering there.  my aunt goes in the house hollering at my mom to hurry and come see, something was outside.  my mother said julie sounded so urgent and odd that she hurried and got dressed and went out front.  startled, she said she just stood there and stared.  the object began to move very slowly.  my mother said she didn't know what she was thinking but grabbed the keys to the car and they all hopped in and followed the craft.  it has been so long ago, and we moved to las vegas in 1965, i don't remember the name of the streets.  haskell i believe is one.  but the ufo dropped behind a hill, my mom drove up the hill.  on the other side of the hill is a reservoir and the water wasn't still...?  never saw anything else.  so long ago we have no pics or video.  it has always been there in my mind, i love watching the night sky looking for more,  i have spent a lot of time camping out in the desert and mountains of nevada looking.
content.summary: Was was fifty years ago.  was in car with mom and saw a fireball flash tru the horizon. looked to be the size of the sun,seemed close. moved accross the horizon and behind the hillside.  behind this hillside is a reservoir.

content.detailedDescription: We live out in the country and arriving home in the evening we noticed 2 objects in the sky. they were bright and the one in front appeared to be firing at the one behind it. this continued across the sky until we could not see them any longer. we were just like wow what was that. this is not the only experience  we have had. there are a few more that were a closer experience. we just wonder why we see so much.
content.summary: Viewed 2 objects in the sky. going in same direction. first one appeared to be firing at the one behind.

content.detailedDescription: Im just a friend that got her photes. but i was shocked to see them
content.summary: The most brilliant green iv'e ever seen also a sqaure star like object with it as well

content.detailedDescription:
On my porch watching for them. observed one flashed my highpowered led flashlight at the object as it flew over with no noise. the object then tripled in brightness and size an flashed in sequence. i saw this object pass over again from the exact opposite direction as the first path only changing direction directly above me in a 30 degree angle. i saw over the course of 3 hours 11 of these star like objects streaming across the night sky three on one occasion all the rest solely. 
these object i have been able to witness on any given clear night. i've had several witness see them with me including my mother, sister, nephew, niece and some friends that were at my residence for a cookout that night.
content.summary: I see many of these star like unknown objects, i have submitted a report as of last year with a video but i do not have a very good camera an the video was hard to see. i have been communicating with these objects and got responses w/ a highpowered flashl

content.detailedDescription: I was a young teenager, it was the middle of the summer,and a hot summer night .It was after mid night ,this i know because television signed off at 2400.My bed was placed at the base of a window .Once in a while i could see military plaines day or night.We lived six miles out of town and the nearest neighbor about one quater of a mile.There was a barbed wire fence about 100ft. from our house . this property was owned by the u s government.E.I.Dupont contracted to build a sister plant to oak ridge tenn.My   dad worked at this plant and later they had 17 reactors.Now you might not find them on the average map . it is a secret.If you knew all ,it would make area 51 look like nothing.As i laid in bed late one night i saw two flat ,round ,bright glowing craft that came in from the south about 300ft or about.( at the time i was a trained member of the ground observer coure ). the average height of trees inthis area was about 20 ft. the flight pattern was like a lead plain with a wing man .All at once they mede a sharp 90% turn to the west then a flash of light . gone in a flash with no noise at all.My dad worked rotateing shifts and days off. a few days after this ,i called my dad out side to talk ,house may have been wired.We did have a meeting with the men in black, and i almost shot them .Another time. i told my dad what i had seen and he couldn't tell me no. he said each time they change the loads in the reactors they come and hoover over the plant.Years later a family friend told me that they make the trianglar charge cells and exchange with the u>f>o>.This property is about 100 square miles maby more and has under ground protection of all types. now you might know that a fence does not stop teenagers.I once heard that a group of ufo watchers were located in aiken south carolina .Did you report on the sighting about 1990 that was as large as anair craft carrier modesto, stockton ione(two prisons) flew over seattle washington took a90%angle up ,a flash of light and out of sight.This story managed to make the 11 oclock news before the government shut it down.
content.summary: Two ufo in rout to savanah river nuclear plant in georgia  do you want to see call me.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a buddy of mine were outside on my back porch trying to find the yu55 comet that was supposed to happen that night. we saw yu55 pass really quick. than about 30-45 minutes after my friend was outside in the same spot talking to someone on his phone. he screamed out my name, i came running out to a ginormous fireball just gliding in the air at first than really fast after a few minutes took a left turn started to descend towards us. after about 30 minutes went by it fell way back below the powerlines we didnt see where it ended up. it lit up the entire sky. we were basically completeley shook so a few days later we started to enhance the videos we actually took. there are two aliens when the video is color edited and slowed down. appearing to be standing on the side of a wormhole or some kind of an opening basically looking like gaurds or waiting for something. the one on the left is really tall lanky,skinny, has a really long neck black eyes  weird head shape also has antennas. the other one on the right was shorter,had antennas, all black eyes skinny neck big oval stomach with stripes going across the stomach. appears to like, some type of bug species if that makes sense. also i found in some of the smoke trails when i paused the video and zoomed in an actual spacecraft not just one, a few of them. i need someone who can help me decrypt whatever that was.I attached a picture from that morning that we seen that incident happen, it was flying around the sun looks like landed right on top of it, snapped that picture with an iphone 4 camera.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Started as  a plane than turned into a fireball and changed directions towards us.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: just sitting in the backyard looking at the sky  i noticed a blue circular a lightn would like a blue light in the middle of it hovering in front of me  i've heard of the blue orbs on the television show hangar one it just was floating havering moving around and then it descended away from me and became smaller i actually called out and ask who was it if they could hear me and it went away from me and  it became  smaller until i couldn't see it anymore
content.summary: blue orb

content.detailedDescription:
I viewed this event in two brief moments over the stated timeline. both while standing in front of my home, facing north, 8-10 miles away from el mirage dry lake bed and looking over and behind the lake bed at the tops of the shadow mountains. the lights were at the very top,spread out left to right what for me was only and inch or so was maybe a mile or more at that distance and height. from my perspective, if the width of all appeared to be just an inch then their individual, round size would be 3/16" average diameters. it's common to see lights on the slopes from camper, their ohv's and campfires but, those are smaller, more pinpoint, typically solitary or paired, spread out over great width from the various campsites and never, on top. simply non-accessible rocky terrain hundreds of feet up a steep slope, without trails. and having lived here for 18 years at this home i've never seen lights on top, ever. 

so the first siting was around 2am when i took the dog out. i noticed the lights immediately. even a bit groggy and confused i knew there were too many, in a straight line and too high up the slope. over the next few minutes i observed 3 to at max 8 or 9 lights glowing larger than normal with mostly clean white light. some faded out, others appeared. a couple never moved while the others gently moved horizontally. sometimes moving a little and stopping and staying. other times moving off and returning. from my great distance all changes seemed gentle and smooth - without purpose. their size all about the same until i noticed some faint blues. no more than two,somewhat smaller, maybe behind the others. the same for a single reddish/orange, to the right or the blues with empty space and a white or two in between. that's the only times i observed any depth to the scene. 

at 4am i had to leave and i wont my friend about 3:45 and again took the dog out. i was surprised to see them still there. i rushed my friend to come see and he agreed - different/out of place. we were talking and observing for about a minute and suddenly the single white light farthest west exploded brilliantly in size. instantly 5 or 6 times in diameter, just as bright with pure white light. huge, in inch in observable height to me but several hundred feet there. over the next few seconds it shrank a bit and faded out. when that happened 1/3 of its diameter was below and in front of the ridge line. watched a couple minutes more but no more flashes and had to leave. my last two thoughts as we left... are there others on the opposite slope above shadow mountain village? and, the colored ones remind me a little of marfa, tx.

last night, my friend had gone home and again around 2am i took the dog out a couple of times before the dawn. neither man or beast saw anything out of the norm. no lights on the ridge. i'm sure the dog will be happy to go out again so i'll keep looking. that flash was bigger than any light i've ever seen. i decided to report this observation via mufon after having found no mention of anyone else observing thru popular social media, news media and sheriff/fire logs. that's how i ended up writing this, i checked mufon logs (first time on their site) to see if someone else had observed and reported. no luck and so since my dog can't wright it feel on me. is there anybody out there?
content.summary: Observed multiple lights above ridgeline. most white. some movement, some times, side to side. colors changed. then huge white flash at 4am. sudden with some duration to smaller size.

content.detailedDescription:
During a visit to providence canyon state park on july 11, 2015, while standing at the edge of the canyon near the visitor center, my wife took a three shot sequence of photographs. there were no aircraft in site. if there was any kind of aircraft, she would have waited until the aircraft had moved out of the shot before taking the photograph.

we neither heard, nor saw any type of aircraft while at the park. nor did we feel anything, nor lost any time.

monday, july 13, 2015, when looking at the photos she took, she noticed an anomaly on 2 of the photos. img_7339 and img_7340 had a small greyish streak that had moved during the taking of the photos. img_7341 was the third photo of the set that was taken but the anomaly had moved out of frame by the time it was taken.

the camera used was a canon 70d with a canon 24-100mm l lens.
content.summary: In 2 photos taken by my wife there is an anomaly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my front doorway that faces north and looked outside while talking to my mother on the phone who heard me talk about what i was seeing. then i called my wife over to see it. she made it over to also see the figure in the sky. 

it is very common that we see planes directly after take off from the nearby buffalo/niagara international airport. we are only a few miles away. typically we see them take off from north west of or house and then go in whatever direction the destination is. we also see and hear other planes in the area flying much higher that do not appear to be landing or taking off from the nearby airport. 

this appeared to be a plane that was just flying over and not taking off or landing. however, the color was not of any i had ever seen before and my wife agreed. 

it essentially appeared to take the steady standard path of a plane but looked like a fireball with no identifying features. it did not just appear to be a plane with colored lights on the wings or tails. this literally appeared to be a glowing ball of red-orange blur. hence the reference above to having fuzzy edges. not thinking much of it, i did not watch it for very long, only about 1 minute. the range of the time was between 9:38 and 9:52. exact time is unknown. that was the range of the call with my mother when i experienced the sighting. 

my mother then strangely saw on the channel 4(cbs) local news a segment on a similar thing she heard me reference on the phone call and mentioned this was where they reported it. so she told me of the contact and here i am reporting it.
content.summary: Looked like an airplane on fire

content.detailedDescription: I was at the canal side during the 4th of july then noticed the lights out n the distant. they were just red hovering lights then noticed 1 decending.I automatically  thought ufo.They were red lights pulsating  at times. noticed them moving slowing right to left then hovering.  also moving up and down then just hovering. i couldn't  believe what i was seeing. we left when the fireworks were over but they remained hovering.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed 3 red lights n the distance.  noticed 1 that devendra from the other 2. the other 2 remained hovering then moving right to left up and down then rising then moving right to left at times.

content.detailedDescription:
The sightings started june 15th. i have already reported that event. the objects were there nightly june 15-28. saw another one july 5th and since july 8th it is nightly again. have multiple pictures & videos. my field investigator has observed a couple as well. they are in our atmosphere, often below cloud line, not always. they're scattered throuout the valley. i've seen them to be around/at the northern mountain range as well. they are usually just hovering in place for hours, can appear & disappear, and change locations nightly. i've filmed them with the sun rising, all stars no longer visible, but they're strobing in the sky still. they have pulsing light patterns. to the eye they flash white, red, yellow, blue, green. from my pictures they seem to be an orb objects. on july 11th around 3 am i finally saw one move at stunning speed. it was the lowest i had seen one yet. it shot straight up, stopped, left/up, stop, up, stop, right/up, stop, up a lot, stop & disappear. i would describe it as incredibly speed, i mean fast!!! it also struck me as graceful & effortless. other times i think i've seen them slowly shift & then hold positions, but the morning of the 11th was awe inspiring. 

what i've observed. they are absolutely in our atmosphere. my mufon representative seems to agree. looking at pictures, they seem to be orbs that radiate patterned light. example: on photo burst every 5th/6th picture they disappear. the lights are sequential. they are bright! the farther away they are, the more star like appearance they take on. i've seen held triangle formations with the three points being the strobing lights, but i've never observed a body. i've also taken pictures on burst where one larger orb will split into 2 smaller orbs in the very next frame.

i've had a very disappointing experience with mufon. to be clear my field investigator is trying to be helpful & has gone above and beyond. unfortunately all roads lead to the state director, who simply could not care less. we can't get video or pictures reviewed, we can't get follow up, we can't investigate, & doesn't even want the investigator coming over to observe without another person, but won't provide another person! and there's no way the state director will walk outside & look, let alone go to someone's house at 3 am. i had to teach my rep how to upload pictures onto mufon! there is no "photo analysis", no investigation, nothing. i would think mufon would be interested in an ongoing sighting & the ability to observe themselves, these objects. i am sending in video this time in the hopes that so how, some way, we can get around the state director. 

i am attaching video to this report. i have used all available space on the report, but i have a lot of video and still shots. a lot. if my field investigator & i are somehow able to get into contact with anyone who is actually interested and who is not the state director, feel free to contact me and i will forward you more. 

thank you!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen multiple objects since june 15, sightings are still happening.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were about to watch our first sons rocket launch for their space camp summer school pprogram. there was a storm coming our way so we looked up at the clouds and i asked her if she was seeing what i was.She asked what it was i said i don't know maybe a uav but it was way to big seemingly. i said it looks like an airbus super guppy but there is no way in hell that it can hover.I said i'm getting my phone out to take a closer look. at this time the object started moving away with no noise or vapor trails or exhaust.Not once was i able to get a picture of  it. it wouldn't appear on my screen and moved off to fast for me to even attempt a picture before it disappeared into the clouds..After it disappeared there was like a rumbling sound kind of like a fighter jet afterburner but not really
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Reminded me of an airbus super guppies but was hovering the left with no noise or contrails or exhaust. could not take a picture of it with my phone

content.detailedDescription:
Location: western kentucky
time: about 9:45 central
view: south-east sky

so last night i'm outside with my brother and his wife. i happen to look up and see what i thought was a bright star fade out to the east by south-east part of the night sky. about 10-15 seconds later it flashes again a little to the south of it's original location. the light lasted for about a second and then faded away - the light itself was stationary. at this time, my sister-in-law asks me if i saw it, too. we spend the next few seconds looking up, and and then it happened again. this third flash was again in a different location, a little further south than the second. it lasted about a second and then disappeared again. we were both puzzled and continued scanning the sky for the next 15 seconds or so before it appeared for it's 4th and final time. this final flash was still slow and went on for about a second, but this one was much further to the south this time. it faded and we didn't see another one. there were trees in the line of sight, and this wasn't too far over them so i can't say for certain if it was flashing behind them or not.
content.summary: A slowly blinking light seemed to appear in different locations.

content.detailedDescription: On a sunday night i was in bed watching the program 'naked & afraid' when i noticed in the west window next to the tv a very bright light. at first i thought it was the moon, then realized the moon wouldn't be at that elevation at approximately 2230, so i went outside (second story deck) for a better look and saw two glowing objects that looked like a planet (larger and brighter than stars) the first larger then the second which was behind and slightly to the left. it was a cloudy night and no other visible stars or the moon in the sky so i thought these must be ufos. i watched them for awhile (ten minutes) then lost interest.  they were stationary, after about 30-45 minutes the smaller one faded out and i went back to watching tv. eventually noticed the larger one was gone. the location was in the vicinity of lockheed. a few days beforehand was the crash of that space shuttle and the next morning on the news they reported a large meteorite that stayed in the sky for about one and a half minutes,  visible across the carolinas and georgia. i think the three events are somehow connected.
content.summary: 2 bright stars/planet like lights stationary,  one larger than the other.

content.detailedDescription: I got up because i heard what sounded like a train always a way. very light vibration. i looked out my kitchen window but didn't see anything. but i could see a bright light. so assumed then it might of been a search light from a far. but then i saw it! it was big. dome shamed! silver. 2 small lights on each sides. it wasn't trying to hide. it was at a decent speed. but it was really low. right above the trees. like it was just out observing. i was in shock. i wish i had got a picture. i was to scared to go out side. it looked man made. very beautiful machinery. idk if aliens were visiting or the military. but it was cool! ppl would definiantly think i was crazy! lol.. i told my son what i saw but i was going to keep it to myself bc ppl would think i went crazy. lol. but then he said some one claims to saw it to some where. for research purposes if it is not a government thing, i figured i better share. i will defiantly be paying attn to the sky for now on and be prepared to take a pic. if i had of been able to get a pic, it would have been a good one.
content.summary: It was done shape, it sounded like a train at a distance. it had bright light. 2 little lights on each sides. was flying low

content.detailedDescription:
At 11 pm on july 12, 2015, i had taken the dog out and looked up to the nw, and the object just appeared, red/rose in color very long size around 300 to 500 feet, and it was bright, it then showed the sky on each side of the object bright blue, it then made a slight turn downward and looked like it dived into the edge of the blue area and everything was gone, including the blue area...Like it closed  the door.

the event lasted  30 seconds.

my location is in the country, where no lights interfere with the observation.

psychological effects none, just amazed in what i saw.
content.summary: Observed a large bright object at 11 pm, red/rose in color very long and lit  up the sky where it was  moving to

content.detailedDescription: Ufo captured at gary airshow 7/12/15.  i turned off the audio because of my gratuitous use of profanity.  you can clearly see the object lighting up and disappearing, then at 1:08 seconds, you can see the thing take off at a ridiculous amount of speed.  we don't have anything made by man that can do the things that i recorded.  if anyone thinks this is fake, the video is in my phone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Please help,
i have been having several different types of ufos fly over my house (going from west to east always)almost every single clear night since march 12th of this year (as far as i have been aware at least). the craft i have seen have been black triangles (various light colors and patterns, which change when i try to reach out to them telepathically), orbs of light (blue ones and orange ones), which have dropped smaller orbs of orange light that went off in various directions and later returned to the hovering main orb, small metallic triangles with 4 white lights (2 craft following each other, touched and went in opposite direction), tube shaped craft with a white light on the back and a gold and blue pulsing power source on the bottom. please help! i'm worried with so many craft flying over every night between 9pm-10:30/11pm. if you come with some night vision cameras, i promise you will not be disappointed. i'm in over my head here. i don't have the technology to record my sightings well enough to see what it really is. i have been looking at them from directly underneath with military binoculars, but i need your help! my head is spinning with how much i have seen and i would like to have someone to help me sort through everything i've seen. my whole family and boyfriend have also witnessed these things and my boyfriend and i are very worried about this. the objects just show up on the west horizon, hover a bit, fly over the house and go east. the first time i saw them i was so afraid i couldn't breathe, then a "blue star" appeared and i suddenly felt very calm, and then all the other craft dispersed. i have drawings of all that i've seen (the photo i included is just from the internet, but its the same as my drawing). please help us figure this out...I would be very grateful and you won't be disappointed. -cheryl
content.summary: Please help- several different types of craft fly over my house almost nightly
